scripts.build:css: sass src/scss/main.scss dist/css/main.css && mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp -R src/fonts/Source_Code_Pro dist/fonts/
scripts.build:css:prod: sass src/scss/main.scss dist/css/main.css --style=compressed --no-source-map && mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp -R src/fonts/Source_Code_Pro dist/fonts/
scripts.watch:css: sass src/scss/main.scss dist/css/main.css --watch & (while true; do mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp -R src/fonts/Source_Code_Pro dist/fonts/; sleep 5; done)
